name: One Click Logo
author: Rajan Karmaker

sections.description:
A very simple plugin which will help you to change the current logo on the login page.
Sometimes you may want to add your site logo on login page then this plugin will be a great help for you to do so.
Feature includes:
* Support Bengali (Bangladesh) translation
* Upload button added for uploading logo
* Add logo via URL
sections.installation:
Installation is fairly straight forward. Install it from the WordPress plugin repository.

Bugs, technical hints or contribute

Please give us feedback, contribute and file technical bugs on GitHub Repo.
sections.changelog:
1.1.3

  • Bug fixs

1.1.2

  • Added Bengali (Bangladesh) translation

1.1.0

  • Upload button added

1.0.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Change logo of the login page with a single click.
